description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Blast (2)

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Cannot be requisitioned due to extreme dangers, can only be granted. Traps Blast area in a state of frozen time for 1d5 Rounds (rolled by GM). Those inside cannot perceive anything, those outside can see inside by can't interact.

system.notes:
Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Cannot be requisitioned due to extreme dangers, can only be granted.
Traps Blast area in a state of frozen time for 1d5 Rounds (rolled by GM). Those inside cannot perceive anything, those outside can see inside by can't interact.
